name: Bridge Addons for Beaver Builder
author: Bridge Addons

sections.description:
Extend your Beaver Builder with advanced modules for free.

  • Button – Create beautiful buttons using our button module.
  • Heading – Style your Headings with Headings module.
  • Icon List – Add some style to your lists with icons.
  • Image – Shape your images with our image module.
  • Info Box – Display your services with info box.
  • Notification – Use notification module to inform your users.
  • Pricing Table – Display your prices using our price table module.
  • Team Member – Introduce your team members using our team member module.
  • Testimonial – Display what other say about your work.
  • Testimonial Slider – Display what other say about your work in slider.
sections.installation:
1) Install Bridge Addons either via the WordPress plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins.

2) Activate Bridge Addons plugin in your dashboard
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

1) Install Bridge Addons either via the WordPress plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins.

2) Activate Bridge Addons plugin in your dashboard.

What are the requirements to use the Bridge Addons?

Bridge Addons work well with all themes. Latest version of Beaver Builder pluign is required on your site in order for Bridge Addons to work.

Can I use Bridge Addons on client sites?

Yes you can.

Do I need coding experience to use Bridge Addons?

Not at all. Bridge Addons are drag and drop modules. No coding expaience required.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0 – May 17, 2018

Added – Testimonial Slider module.

1.1.0 – Apr 20, 2018

Added – Testimonial module.
Added – Notification module.
Fixed – Button module unable to remove icon.
Fixed – Team Member description padding issue.

1.0.1 – Apr 02, 2018

Fixed – Removed default bullet list from icon list module and price table module.
Fixed – Button background color.

1.0.0 – Mar 30, 2018

Initial Release.
